extendedInfo.description: The BIG-IPÂ® Edge Clientâ¢ for all Android 4.x (Ice Cream Sandwich) devices secures and accelerates mobile device access to enterprise networks and applications using SSL VPN and optimization technologies. Access is provided as part of an enterprise deployment of F5 BIG-IPÂ® Access Policy Managerâ¢, Edge Gatewayâ¢, or FirePassâ¢ SSL-VPN solutions.BIG-IPÂ® Edge Clientâ¢ for all Android 4.x (Ice Cream Sandwich) Devices Features:- Provides accelerated mobile access when used with F5 BIG-IPÂ® Edge Gateway- Automatically roams between networks to stay connected on the go- Full Layer 3 network access to all your enterprise applications and files- Supports Weblogon protocol for multi-factor authentication. - Supports custom URL scheme for creating Edge Client configurations- Supports custom URL scheme for starting and stopping Edge Client- Allows administrator to enforce device lock settings- Supports detection of rooted devices- Supports provisioning of Edge Client configuration with AirWatch MDMRequirements: (Contact your IT Administrator)- Android 4.0 or later (Ice Cream Sandwich) Device- F5 BIG-IPÂ® Edge Gateway, Access Policy Manager or FirePass SSL VPN solutionsBEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD OR USE THIS APPLICATION YOU MUST AGREE TO THE EULA HERE: http://www.f5.com/apps/android-help-portal/eula.htmlNOTE: please refer to the Edge Client help page for instructions for uninstalling the application.BEFORE YOU CONTACT F5 SUPPORT, PLEASE SEE: http://support.f5.com/kb/en-us/solutions/public/2000/600/sol2633.html

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on galaxy tab 2
reviews.comment: For a product that\'s supposed to be \"any device, any where\", they sure have a lot of devices they don\'t work with.  Had a terrible time getting it to work on Linux also.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Works excellently. Allows me to connect in with my tablet without having to bring out my leviathan of a laptop.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No DROID RAZR support
reviews.comment: No support and i cannot contact F5 for assistance in getting it working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jellybean
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my nexus 7. Although the portal does. Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 2fa working
reviews.comment: Excellent.2fa is now working through web login
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: They added Web Logon and the app is now perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works perfect
reviews.comment: This works great connectivity wise.  The GUI needs a bit of fine tuning.  But, that is no big, since the point here is connectivity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Client Certificates
reviews.comment: Would be good to turn off Client Certificates as an option (like the iPod app) our network uses RSA token for authentication.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Xoom with ICS, only downside is not optimized for tablets.  No real biggie nor worth dropping a star.  The app just works and I\'m able to VPN and do what needs to be done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: works well as a vpn client
reviews.comment: works great. Landscape mode for my tablet for the client configuration screen please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works flawlessly
reviews.comment: I have ICS on both Asus transformer Prime and Gnax. It works without a glitch on them. You need to update your prime to be able to install this. I can do remote desktop to my work PC from both devices using remote RDP app. F5 level of support is amazing. I can see why my college went with F5 for VPN. If you have ICS, you will work from your tablet at home.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working...
reviews.comment: Running ICS. This apparently doesn\'t work with all f5 servers like the iOS app does. Not compatible with my universities f5 vpn...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Great on my iconia a500 on ics, finally able to use it after the ics update :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Perfectly
reviews.comment: Glad to see native vpn support in Android 4.0+   Great turnaround by F5.  Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Works really well for my VPN
reviews.author: A Google User
